title: Queue Timers
body: Because your client has stuffed up and having log in issues I am getting queue timers because your client wouldn't let me log in, I really don't want 20 minute queue timers because of the screwed up client you guys made.

replies.body:
I said that I wouldn't mind waiting a bit longer in queue to get the position I want. But that doesn't mean 20 minutes (it was initially 3, and I was thinking of 10 at the most). 

What's even worse, is that after I've been in queue for 20 minutes, I get auto-filled into ADC anyway... So literally wasting 20 minutes of my time to get into 40 minutes of a position I hate and am useless at, and BOOM! just like that I'm down 20 LP.
